info.title: Website Path Manager
info.description: It's the website's path giver. All classes should rely on this path giver class in order for the code to work both on development and production server.

method.name: getWebsiteFolder
method.description: Get the website folder which contains website data (pages, source, scripts).

method.name: getSettingsFolder
method.description: Get the inner settings folder in the website folder.

method.name: getMapFolder
method.description: Get the inner map folder in the website folder.

method.name: getPageFolder
method.description: Get the inner page folder path in the website folder.

parameter.name: $pagePath
parameter.description: The page path as taken from the request uri. No extension should provided.

method.name: getSourceFolder
method.description: Get the inner source folder in the website folder.

method.name: getWebsiteLibrary
method.description: Get website library root folder. It includes resources (media), scripts and styles.

method.name: getCoreRsrcFolder
method.description: Gets the website core resources folder.

method.name: getWebsiteResources
method.description: Gets the website resources root folder.
method.returndescription: The websites resources root folder path.

method.name: getExtensionFolder
method.description: Get the folder path for the given extension.

parameter.name: $extensionID
parameter.description: The extension id to get the folder path.
